DataSourcePortable.Name: CRM_PERFORMANCE_SEMANAS_ANTERIORES
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT TOP(12)
 B.NOME AS NOME,
 C.TRIMESTRE,
 C.SEMANA,
 (
 SELECT
 ROUND(SUM(
 ROUND(
 (CAST(DD.REALIZADO AS FLOAT) * 100 )/CAST(DD.META AS FLOAT),
 2)
 )/COUNT(DD.HANDLE),2) AS TOTAL
 FROM K_CRM_PERFORMANCEITEM DD
 WHERE DD.PERFORMANCESEMANA = C.HANDLE
 ) AS PORCENTAGEM
FROM K_CRM_PERFORMANCEANO A
JOIN Z_GRUPOUSUARIOS B ON B.HANDLE = A.USUARIO
JOIN K_CRM_PERFORMANCESEMANA C ON A.HANDLE = C.PERFORMANCEANO
WHERE A.USUARIO = 142 AND GETDATE() > C.DATAFIM
" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="NOME" From="A" Path="NOME" /> <Field Alias="TRIMESTRE" From="A" Path="TRIMESTRE" /> <Field Alias="SEMANA" From="A" Path="SEMANA" /> <Field Alias="PORCENTAGEM" From="A" Path="PORCENTAGEM" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
